text: Yoko! Jakamoko! Toto! is a British animated children's television series. It was produced by Collingwood O'Hare Productions Limited, originally distributed by HIT Entertainment and currently distributed by Foothill Entertainment. It aired from 2 June 2003 until 29 August 2005 on CITV, and then rebroadcast on CBeebies from 26 January 2009 to 2 June 2013. It is about a bird-of-paradise named Yoko, an armadillo named Jakamoko, and a spider monkey named Toto. ==References== Category:2003 British television series debuts Category:Children's animated television series Category:Children's entertainment Category:Animated television series Category:Children's television series
title: Yoko! Jakamoko! Toto!
